description: This file is a Python module responsible for generating C++ header and source code from JSON-RPC schema descriptions. It includes functions for creating API headers, generating class definitions, enum registrations, version info, stubs, and full RPC implementations based on the provided schema.

methods.name: CreateApiHeader(log, source_name, path, headers)
methods.description: Generates a C++ header file with JSON-RPC API definitions, including necessary headers and comments.

methods.name: Create(log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs, generate_rpc)
methods.description: Main function that processes a given JSON schema to generate C++ code, including classes, enums, version info, stubs, and RPC implementations, depending on parameters.

ctags.name: Create
ctags.pattern: /^def Create(log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs/
ctags.signature: (log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs, generate_rpc)
